layout.title: Ticketing Made Simple. Experiences Made Unforgettable.
layout.description: Your time, your passion and  your adventures made more accessible than ever. Connects to activities you care about, with a seamless experience from start to finish.

choice.title: Welcome to TicketWaze
choice.description: Choose an option to continue and set up your account.

attendee.title: Attendee
attendee.description: Easily browse, discover, and purchase tickets for a wide variety of events.

organisation.title: Organisation
organisation.description: Create and manage activities effortlessly. Track ticket sales & monitor attendee data.

onboarding.description: Let’s get to know you better so we can personalize your experience.

noAuth.title: You are not Logged in
noAuth.description: Access your account to securely manage tickets, complete actions, and enjoy a seamless experience.

Explore.title: Explore Activities
Explore.subtitle: Welcome Back
Explore.noEvent: Looks like there are no upcoming activities at the moment. Check back later or explore other categories to discover exciting activities near you!

Wallet.title: Wallet
Wallet.subtitle: Welcome Back
Wallet.referralDescription: Grow Our Community Together Help your friends discover amazing tickets and experiences, and earn 5 points for each successful referral!

transactions.title: Recent Transactions
transactions.description: Your orders will appear here once transactions start rolling in.

withdrawal.title: Withdrawal history
withdrawal.description: Your withdrawal history will show up here once you've made a withdrawal request.

Upcoming.title: Upcoming Activities
Upcoming.subtitle: Welcome Back
Upcoming.description: There are no upcoming activity right now. Stay tuned to discover and book the next ones!

History.title: Activities history
History.subtitle: Welcome Back
History.description: You haven’t attended any activities yet. Once you join an activity, it will appear here for you to revisit your past experiences.

Event.notInvited: Access Restricted: This is a private activity visible only to invited participants.
Event.share_text: Spread the word and invite your friends! Share this activity on social media or via direct message.
Event.reportEventDescription: Help us keep the platform safe. Share details about any issues with this activity.
Event.reportOrganisationDescription: Help us keep the platform safe. Share details about any issues with this organisation.
Event.question: What issue do you have with this activity?
Event.question2: What issue do you have with this organisation?
Event.validStatus: You must select a valid reason
Event.name: Full Name
Event.ticketWarning1: Your ticket is personal—don’t share it.

Checkout.purchased_text: Your purchase is confirmed! Access it anytime in upcoming activities or check your email for a copy

ticket.title: Buy Ticket
ticket.select: Select a ticket type to continue
ticket.ticketWarning: Tickets are non-refundable. All sales are final.

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.someone: I’m purchasing this ticket for someone else
recipient.error: Please fill in attendee information for all tickets marked for someone else
recipient.warning: Please double-check the information before submitting. If these details are incorrect, the person may not be able to access their ticket.
recipient.name: Full Name

payment.title: Payment
payment.nopayment: This activity is completely free of charge. No payment is required to complete your registration. Just continue to confirm your ticket and you’re all set.
payment.secured: Your security matters to us. Every transaction is processed through encrypted channels and monitored in real time to prevent fraud and ensure your personal information remains protected. Our systems are supervised by trusted partners and comply with the highest industry standards for data and payment security.

Liked.title: Like activities
Liked.noEvent: You haven’t liked any activities yet. Browse upcoming activities and tap the ❤️ to save your favorites!
